name: Little Space
description:
My entry for my first Ludum Dare! A little space-building-action-defense-thingy. Have fun!

Controls (Mouse needed) :

Left Mouse: Build / Use buttons / Start Interceptor

Right Mouse: Deselect

Check out the tutorial for backstory and further explanations.

UPDATE:

If you have trouble with the mouse controls (unable to scroll down, unable to build rooms on one side), try the downloadable version. Just download the zip-file and start "nw.exe".
